title: Android 5.0 Lollipop officially named ahead of release | Trusted Reviews
description: ![]()### Alexa’s new whisper mode rolls out in US today – here’s how to enable it](https://www.trustedreviews.com/news/how-to-enable-alexa-whisper-mode-echo-3607478 "Alexa’s new whisper mode rolls out in US today – here’s how toenable it")  * There are far more notification settings, a brand new battery saving featurethat aims to extend the life of your extisting device by up to 90 minutes.There’s also 64 bit CPU support with Android 5.0 Lollipop too.  **  Read more:[Android 5.0 Lollipop features – What’snew?](https://www.trustedreviews.com/opinions/android-5-0-l-features-list-what-s-new)  **
